name: HomeMateSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Ask Alexa to control your HomeMate Smart products!
After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “HomeMate Smart” app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “HomeMate Smart” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “HomeMate Smart” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
* Alexa, turn on bedroom light
* Alexa, turn off bedroom air conditioner
* Alexa, set bedroom light to red
* Alexa, set kitchen light to 20 percent
* Alexa, set office ac to 21 degrees
* Alexa, change channel to 105 on airtel tv

If you have any questions or problems, please email us at support@homemate.co.in
